Title: Relates to right of way for vehicles traveling in adjacent lanes
Summary: Requires that a driver in possession of a lane must yield the right of way to all vehicles which properly signal their intent to merge into their lane or are attempting to avoid an obstacle in the road.
LawCode: Add ยง1147, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to right of way for vehicles traveling in adjacent lanes
